00038 #ifndef MSQ_PLANAR_DOMAIN_HPP
00039 #define MSQ_PLANAR_DOMAIN_HPP
00040 
00041 #include "MeshInterface.hpp"
00042 #include "Vector3D.hpp"
00043 
00044 namespace MESQUITE_NS
00045 {
00050   class MESQUITE_EXPORT PlanarDomain : public Mesquite::MeshDomain
00051   {
00052   public:
00053     enum Plane{ XY = 2, XZ = 1, YZ = 0 };
00054   
00055     inline PlanarDomain( Plane orient, double offset = 0.0 )
00056     {
00057       Vector3D normal(0,0,0), point(0,0,0);
00058       normal[orient] = 1.0;
00059       point[orient] = offset;
00060       set_plane( normal, point );
00061     }
00062     
00063     PlanarDomain() {}
00064   
00065     inline PlanarDomain(const Vector3D& normal, const Vector3D& point)
00066       { set_plane( normal, point ); }
00067     
00068     virtual ~PlanarDomain();
00069       
00070     void fit_vertices( Mesh* mesh, 
00071                        MsqError& err,
00072                        double epsilon = 0.0 );
00073       
00074     void fit_vertices( Mesh* mesh, 
00075                        const Mesh::VertexHandle* vertex_array,
00076                        size_t vertex_array_length,
00077                        MsqError& err,
00078                        double epsilon = 0.0 );
00079 
00080     void set_plane( const Vector3D& normal, const Vector3D& point );
00081 
00082     void flip();
00083 
00084     const Vector3D& get_normal() const { return mNormal; }
00085     
00086     double get_coeff() { return mCoeff; }
00087     
00088     Vector3D get_origin() const { return -mCoeff * mNormal; }
00089     
00090     virtual void snap_to(Mesh::VertexHandle entity_handle,
00091                          Vector3D &coordinate) const;
00092     
00093     virtual void vertex_normal_at(Mesh::VertexHandle entity_handle,
00094                                   Vector3D &coordinate) const;
00095     
00096     virtual void element_normal_at(Mesh::ElementHandle entity_handle,
00097                                    Vector3D &coordinate) const;
00098     
00099     virtual void vertex_normal_at(const Mesh::VertexHandle* handle,
00100                                   Vector3D coords[],
00101                                   unsigned count,
00102                                   MsqError& err) const;
00103 
00104     virtual void closest_point( Mesh::VertexHandle handle,
00105                                 const Vector3D& position,
00106                                 Vector3D& closest,
00107                                 Vector3D& normal,
00108                                 MsqError& err ) const;
00109 
00110     virtual void domain_DoF( const Mesh::VertexHandle* handle_array,
00111                              unsigned short* dof_array,
00112                              size_t num_vertices,
00113                              MsqError& err ) const;
00114 
00115   private:
00116     Vector3D mNormal;
00117     double mCoeff;
00118   };
00119 }
